text:
I graduated
with a degree in marine science
and it was a bit tough to get a job.

But then another door opened,
preparing for

AWS certification exams,
and taking up this career path
has given me a better feeling about myself
and my abilities.

Going through the certifications
gave me the confidence to plow

through industry and feel more at home
with cloud resources.

I used AWS Skill Builder free resources
as part of my studying plan.

I was really surprised
at how much supporting material AWS
makes freely available.
makes freely available.
Before moving to the cloud,

I spent like three years designing
cars, designing high voltage systems.

Cloud is becoming, today, a fundamental
skill for everyone who is working in IT.

This opportunity of learning and getting
certified accelerated my career.
Now I have 10 AWS certifications.

I have felt successful and happy
with what I am doing,

and I wanted to offer the same opportunity
to people belonging to my community.

Personally
Skill Builder has really helped me

gather all the knowledge that I need for
my exams and my certifications,

as well as giving me knowledge
which I take into my work
when I'm using AWS on a daily basis.

The Certified Cloud Practitioner
Certification opened doors for me

and that helped me
put face to face with potential employers.

I started working for Devoteam
earlier this year and since then

I've also achieved AWS Solutions
Architect and Developer
Associate certifications.
After finishing

my degree,
I had a tough time finding my first job.

My certifications helped me to get noticed
by potential employers
and eventually grow my career much faster.

I am now able to resolve complex tasks
and cut my resolution time
by at least twice as much.

Skill Builder helps me stay current
and learn skills in specialized areas
any time.

I plan to continue learning
to stay in demand and keep growing.
